page.title: 12HOME LIFE continued
page.content: Home Life 11.20am Me and Sarah (my sister) weighed some lambs,they weighed about 85.90 kg each. 1.30pm Had dinner ,lamb chops and peas. 2.00pm Me and Dad dreached the lambs to stop them from getting worms. 4.00pm Went and played with my freind Chadd while Dad docked the ram. 5.10pm Had tea and a cup of orange and a slice of cake. 6.00pm Got the cows in and did the milking on my own ,we have 48 cows altogether. 7.30pm Finished the milking and then watched TV. 9.00pm Had a weetabix and a cup of coffee and then went to bed.
